reviews.review_msg: Milena is one of the best professors I have ever met. Her genuine interest towards the class is absolutely one of a kind. Also, if you are into video gaming like me you will find this class more interesting than you can ever imagine.
Honestly, one of the best profs I've met!

The type of course is very technical. For the projects, if you tried, and it is not what he liked, you won't get a great mark. He expects a bit too much for a intro course. When I confronted him with some grades that needs to be explained, he had a very bad attitude and try to justify himself rudely.

I know Norbert, and he was thrown into the course because no one else will teach it.  He only has an MA and not a Phd.  He really didn't know much about it when he started.  Yes, if he is late it is OK, but God forbid anyone else is!

His marking schemes are weird, the more u try the more u will fail. So basically try as little as possible.. so you will fail n e ways as well. He tries to be helpful, but when you actually asks him, he said he doesnt have time. He gets mad at people turning on the laptop too, if you are not smart.
